+++ General
The WikidPad editor provides a find & replace facility; it is a reasonably standard facility, like also word processors and other editors provide. A particular detail is that it supports [RegEx |regular expressions] in the search field.

rel://files/FindReplace1.png

To start the find & replace dialog:
	* press Ctrl-R
	* select Editor / "Find and replace" from the main menu
